mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) co FROM EMI_DEVICE_INFO a

SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.service_id , a.branch_id , a.model_seq , a.device_oid , a.comm_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(a.comm_type) as comm_type_nm , a.device_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(a.device_type) as device_type_nm , INET_NTOA(ip) as ip , a.port , a.allow_yn , DATE_FORMAT(a.init_reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS init_reg_dt , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.dest_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS dest_dt , DATE_FORMAT(b.last_comm_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS last_comm_dt , b.device_stat FROM EMI_DEVICE_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN EWSN_DEVICE_STATUS b ON (a.device_id = b.device_id)

SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.service_id , a.branch_id , a.model_seq , a.device_oid , a.comm_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(a.comm_type) as comm_type_nm , a.device_type , FNC_GET_CODE_NM(a.device_type) as device_type_nm , INET_NTOA(ip) as ip , a.port , a.allow_yn , DATE_FORMAT(a.init_reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS init_reg_dt , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.dest_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS dest_dt , DATE_FORMAT(b.last_comm_dt,'${prop.dt}') AS last_comm_dt , b.device_stat FROM EMI_DEVICE_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN EWSN_DEVICE_STATUS b ON (a.device_id = b.device_id) WHERE a.device_id = #{device_id}
